attributes.action: call a general election following the disputed expenses claims.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Members of Parliament are elected by the public to represent them in public office, and the nature of some of the claims show that some MPs have been taking advantage of their position. The cross-party nature of this scandal shows that simply disciplining MPs cannot restore full public confidence in Parliament, but a general election will allow the public to have their say on whether their MP can be trusted with the power given to them by the people. An election should take place as soon as possible, to allow the public to have full confidence that their MP is working for the constituents, rather than themselves.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
